name: gmail-api-sync
description: Sync, query and parse Gmail e-mails with Google API. Provides full and partial e-mail synchronization, as well as parsing the returned message objects into text and html. Takes care of Google Oauth 2 authentication with convenience methods.

scripts._deps-update: echo '* Updating packages versions... '; npm-check-updates -u --upgradeAll --error-level 1 && npm install
scripts._check-changes: echo '* Checking if git directory is clean... '; bash -c '[[ -z $(git status -uno --porcelain) ]]'
scripts.update-deps: npm run _check-changes && npm run _deps-update && git commit -am 'updated deps'
scripts.pretest: npm run lint && npm run nsp && npm run _deps-check
scripts.coveralls: npm run cover -- --report lcovonly && cat ./coverage/lcov.info | coveralls
scripts.commit-and-push: npm run _commit && npm test && npm run _push
scripts.patch-release: npm test && npm run _patch-release && npm run _push
scripts.minor-release: npm test && npm run _minor-release && npm run _push
scripts.__major-release: npm test && npm run _major-release && npm run _push
